question: he spends alot of money and time on his car and it causes alot of problems as well
answer:
QUESTION
i have noticed that my brother has a hobby of building cars and it is really taking over his life, he spends alot of money and time on his car and it causes alot of problems as well, as he will not listen to anything i or anyone says, even our father, so what can i say to him and what adivce would you give to him to help him understand that he should just stop doing it and listen, please provide some hadith and ayaas of Qur'an if possible
ANSWER


Share:

Your brother seems to have an obsession with cars. If opposing him will not help, consider not opposing him.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
